Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; DECORATED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL
Name: Vase
Description: Vase with straigth pointed rim, curved walls and unstable base with convex bottom. Orangey-coloured paste. The exterior surface is partially covered with a reddish coating. On the body, between the rim and the base and set off by two horizontal grooves, is an imprinted decoration of stamps with the motif of the crux ansata, arranged in six horizontal bands.
